attributes.action: give students in halls the same rights as patrons of hotels with regards to television licences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently hotels pay for one TV licence for their first 15 rooms and one for each subsequent 5 rooms. Students in halls pay for one per room. Students are one of the poorest groups in society and should be afforded the same rights as hotels and their patrons.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "give students in halls the same rights as patrons of hotels with regards to television licences."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14379.asp
